name: Around the World in 1 Night
effect:
Order: Ready Christophe Kringle.
What to my Narawat eyes should appear? A chariot sleigh and four demonic reindeer.

name: Black Petre
effect:
Elf
Toymaker Spend Order: Search your deck for a non-unique item, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand. You may only perform this action if Christophe Kringle is your Warlord.
Beside him sat Black Petre, a cranky old elf; I ran for my life, in spite of myself.

name: Blade Dancer
effect:
Mercernary Reindeer
Monster May not equip items Spend Order: Target a stunned character within two ranks. Kill the target character.
To the city streets fly, surmount its stone walls. Now wipe them out, wipe them out, slay one and all."

name: Blitzer
effect:
Mercenary Reindeer
Monster May not equip items Blitzer inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike. Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character within two ranks.
Faster than falcons to his summons they came He shouted to the demons and called their true names:

name: Christophe Kringle
effect:
Deverenian Overlord
Unique Christophe is a Warlord on December 24th and 25th. If Christophe is your Warlord, you may replace your starting characters with Reindeer characters, ignoring character levels. Order: Once per turn, ready a Reindeer.
The Deverenians were hanged by the ramparts with care as bait to draw the red warrior there.

name: Comet
effect:
Mercenary Reindeer
Monster May not equip items React: Once per turn, after Comet kills a character with a melee strike or action, htat character's player must discard a card from his or her hand.
Unnerving it was, I heard on the roof The clawing and scratching of each demon's hoof.

name: Cookies and Milk
effect:
Order: Remove all wounds from Christophe Kringle.
Seeing his eyes and the sword drawn over his head, I knew that I and my unit soon would be dead.

name: Down the Chimney
effect:
Order: Move Christophe Kringle to your first rank. Unless he is stunned, Christophe performs a melee strike.
As he drew his sword unnoticed by those around, down the chimney the red warrior jumped to the ground.

name: Kringle's Armor
effect:
Armor
Unique Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from this character. Order: Once per turn, remove one wound from Christophe Kringle.

name: Kringle's Bag
effect:
Unique
React: After an item equipped by this character is discarded, shuffle the item into your deck. React: Once per turn, if this bad is equipped to Christophe Kringle, reveal cards from the top of your deck until and item is revealed. Put the item in your hand, and shuffle the other cards back into the deck.

name: Kringle's Sleigh
effect:
"Steed
Unique Reindeer in your army have the ability ""Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank."" Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank."
I heard him exclaim as he drove out of sight "I'll be back for more carnage one year from tonight!"

name: Storm Dasher
effect:
Mercenary Reindeer
Monster May not equip items React: Once per turn, after a Reindeer is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, cancel the strike.
Tally ho ye demons, Comet and Blade Dancer! Get a move on, foul beasts Blitzer and Storm Dasher!
